entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 03:35 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 7.1°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
